concept.title: Freshly-Squeezed Orange Juice
concept.shortdesc: Orange juice is the perfect way to start your day, it's both refreshing and healthy.

conbody.p: Typically, we buy our orange pre-squeezed from the store. However, it is healthier and more tasty to squeeze your juice on your own. This way, you know its fresh and let's not ignore the obious fact that using a juicer is fun!
